name: test_verify_sale_in_cart
description:
Verify sale badge appears correctly in the cart.

Adds the first product to the cart and checks that the discounted price is displayed.
descriptionHtml:
Verify sale badge appears correctly in the cart.

Adds the first product to the cart and checks that the discounted price is displayed.
